sentences.en: A minute projection on the surface of a stigma , petal, or leaf.
sentences.cn: '乳突'.''花柱头 、 花瓣或叶子表面上细小''.'的'. ''隆起物.

sentences.en: A petal fluttered to the ground.
A slice of petal, a postcard, the beautiful remembrance when being old!
sentences.cn: 一片花瓣 、 一张明信片, 都将是年老时美丽的回忆!

sentences.en: Annulet knob, circle knob, there are four leafs petal form.
sentences.cn: 小环钮, 圆钮座, 有四出叶瓣形.

sentences.en: Each white petal had a stripe of red.
sentences.cn: 每一片白色的花瓣上都有一条红色的条纹.

sentences.en: Entering the grove, he strolled along the petal - strewn ground, pushing aside the lowhanging branches.
sentences.cn: 他走进了梅林,踏着散落在地上的花瓣, 用手披开垂下的树枝,在梅林里面慢步闲走.

sentences.en: First we have to observe how a natural petal looks.
sentences.cn: 首先我们必须观察一下天然的花瓣是什么样子.

sentences.en: I would like a flower design, white flowers with red petal.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢花形图案, 白色花朵,红色花蕊.

sentences.en: In this period, also have had blossom exuberant fallen petal wither.
sentences.cn: 在这期间有花开茂盛, 也有落花凋零.

sentences.en: Look soft and natural with the sheerest neutrals and petal pinks.
sentences.cn: 中性色彩和粉花瓣色带给你柔和自然的妆感.

sentences.en: May I bring you the rose - petal salad?
sentences.cn: 给你来点玫瑰色拉 如何 ?

sentences.en: On enlarged photographs of the rose petal, the images are crystal clear.
sentences.cn: 把玫瑰花瓣的上图像放大后, 这些图像的内容极为清晰.

sentences.en: Petal drop pieces down just dancing a butterfly, very beautiful!
sentences.cn: 一片片花瓣落了下来,像一只只翩翩起舞的蝴蝶, 美丽极了!

sentences.en: Petal: Congratulations Steve, where do you find your inspiration?
sentences.cn: 恭喜你啊!斯蒂夫, 你在那里寻找灵感的?

sentences.en: The soul unfolds itself , like a lotus of conmtless petal.
sentences.cn: 灵魂像一朵千瓣的莲花, 自己绽放着.

trans.tran_en: one of the coloured parts of a flower that are shaped like leaves
